Du var rimelig stresset der en stund.

- Don't mess with them--
 No, no, that's all right.

Kanskje du har lyst til å sette deg på balkongen og tegne litt? Ja, gjør det.

Hey, do you wanna go sit on the balcony and draw a little?
 Yeah, do that. Good.

Con muốn ra ban công ngồi vẽ không?
 Ừ, con ra đi.

So why wouldn't you tell me that?
 We were on our way to having a nice night, all right?

Please. Enough.
 No, you really do, okay?

You even quit going to the doctor

How many suggestions have I come up with

I'm not good enough.
 Everything's wrong all the time.

-That's not-- -I've not changed.
 -It's not-- -I'm exactly the same, yeah?

Ego trip?
 …ruining everything we've got!

Ja. Gå og hent badebuksa di.

in Madrid.
 They take this very seriously.

Det går bra. Jeg bare… Det er så mye jobb hele tiden, så…

Chị đang muốn nói gì?
 Chỉ là…

Yeah, okay.
 And you don't think I hear you at night, having those nightmares?

And then you come here

I have to be happy

Hey, that is not okay--
 You don't think of anyone but yourself, and you use our trauma

Hvis du ikke vil ha meg i livet ditt, så skal du få slippe det.

- The fuck? - Erik!

Chúng xuất hiện từ sâu dưới đất. Bọn tôi quen rồi, có suốt.
 Nhưng tự dưng chúng lại đang xuất hiện ngày càng cao.

 it's still expanding at a slow rate.

en: Bergmasse på størrelse med Manhattan vil bli skjøvet ut i havet.
pa:
we're talking about hours.
 And rocks the size of Manhattan will be pushed out into the sea.
vi: Và những tảng đá to bằng Manhattan sẽ bị đẩy xuống biển. Hậu quả…

en: Og konsekvensene…

We can't alert people without being prepared.
 It will be chaos.

Go.
 Go.

Đi đi.
 Đi đi.

DANH SÁCH HÀNH KHÁCH

Um, uh…

Men når gir asken seg?

Hvorfor ikke det?

Are you drawing the beach?
 It's good, yeah. I like that a lot.
 Oh, why not?

that we know what's down there.
 I'm sure you knew that.

That's good.
 -Yeah. - Yeah.

Hey, I'm sorry
 for earlier.

Uh,
 why'd you get off?

and… I've gotta stop being so scared,

do you like me

Hi.
 Hi, where are you?
